OOC: OK, please do not take offence to this post. Diamond is a Pred 
and cares little for life,save her own.  It's the char and nothing 
else. OK? Cool. 

Diamond::

She still felt that this type of work was benieth her, but she was 
going to do as told. "Yesss commander. I ssshall acomplisssh the 
tasssk at hand."  She took the DNA collector and headed out. 

She went to the hanger bay and got the small skyflier out and left 
the base.  She went along and took every sample she could gather. And 
leaving a trail of dead animals in her wake. 


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::FZ::
> 
> FZ nods. "Good. Follow me. Perndabot, stay here and patrol."
> 
> Perndabot nods and FZ walks off toward the Iron Fist, motioning for 
> Biomass to follow. His internal comp replies to Diamond while he 
> walks.
> 
> "I need you to go get me any DNA samples you can get from this 
> continent," he says to Diamond over the comm, "There's a fairly 
high 
> demand of DNA right now, and we'll be needing some."
>
